On this episode, I spoke about my PhD research on the stereotypical framing of migrants and refugees in media coverage comparing Brazil and the United Kingdom (UK). 

::: callout-note
## Episode based on my dissertation

During my PhD, I have published four different papers on migration framing. You can find the full details of the papers below the episode. 
:::
